I recently graduated from The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill with an MS in biostatistics in 2020.

Previously, I taught middle school math for 5 years in a Title I public school in Pittsboro, North Carolina. 

I recieved my teaching degree from Appalachian State University in 2013.

My Resume is available [here](files/TyDarnell-Resume.pdf).
